summary:
Riften Grid combines three Player fascilities in Riften.
-It is recommended to finish the thane quests before installing this mod.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#b6b6b6][size=3][size=3][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74308-0-1458482787.png[/img]
[/size]Credit to [color=#f6b26b][b]Jokerine[/b][/color] for the Forever Free! logo, download from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/58832/?]here.[/url]

[color=#999999][size=5]Riften Grid combines 3 Player fascilities in Riften.[/size][/color]
-It is recommended to finish the Thane quests before installing this mod.

1. [b]By Riften Grid[/b], Honeyside is ready for you to move in. You still need the key which also will unlock my other mods in Riften. All new houses/homes have new entrances and cells. They will not conflict with any of the vanilla houses or cells.
The exterior is dressed; [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12861/?]Landscaped_Honeyside[/url] by [b]Ohiogramps[/b]Â  makes the outer area more welcome.

2. [b]Riften Grid[/b] connects [b]Honeyside[/b], [b]The Player's Lair[/b] and [b]The Player's Temple[/b].
You can enter the Grid from the Honeyside basement and enter [b]The Lair[/b] through a sewer.

3. [b]The Player's Lair[/b] is actually a large place to live for your followers. A cook and two prospective companions are living in there. They visit the market every day during the opening hours and return to The Lair to dine in the evening.
From The Lair you have 3 exits:
-[b]Exterior Riften[/b] under the Honeyside Terrace, which is now equipped with a larger dock and a ship and some other naval objects to stay in style with the needs of a Thane.
-[b]Riften's lower level docks[/b], beside the Riften Beggar's Row entrance.
-[b]Riften Player Temple[/b] with some beds and a longtable for your companions. Exit also to the backyard of Riftweald Manor, Mercer Frey's House.

Thanks to Bethesda Softworks for creating wonderous games.
Thanks a lot to my friends on the nexusmods.

[/size][/color]
author: fredlaus
